Text.Value: Rest of you - head on in.
Aye.
Welcome back, True Soul.
Absolute's blessings.
Disciple Z'rell's in the great hall. She'll be wanting to see you.
*His thoughts seek yours, searching, grasping. Your parasite squirms in recognition.*
Welcome back, True Soul.
You! Heretic!

EditorData.logicalname: Started ambush with harpers and lost.

Text.Value: Best to head in and find out. Should be a good show.
A - a True Soul? Why would one of your followers fight with the Harpers, Majesty?
The others will go in, but I will go up. My queen summons me to her chapel - to be in her presence.
Stupid creature.

EditorData.NodeContext: with a snort. referring to the drider

Text.Value: My mistake. Your mind tastes familiar.
New meat, drider?
They return once more, Majesty. What do they want?
'Welcome back'? I've never been here before.
We apologise. We never meant to disrupt any plans.
I hear you, sweet Majesty. I am coming, my queen!

EditorData.AnimationTags: [drider] scuttles up the side of the tower <Greg>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The drider scuttles up the side of Moonrise Tower's wall, toward the roof.
EditorData.NodeContext: Gleeful - religious ecstacy. The queen you're referring to is your god, the Absolute.

Text.Value: Helped us with some Harpers on the way too. They're shadowbait now.
What's this? Who are these, Majesty?

EditorData.logicalname: Caravan spawned at ambush alone and avoided their encounter

Text.Value: Move.

EditorData.NodeContext: Dismissive snort. Looks player over. You're suspicious.

Text.Value: The General's advisor went off on a field trip - Z'rell's in charge 'til he gets back.
What news inside the tower?
*Your minds connect and you hear a voice whispering to you. The Absolute? Or just the echoes of his fractured mind, reverberating in the darkness?*

EditorData.SFXTags: [RS] Mindmeld, whispered echos of Drieder's mind

Text.Value: What's someone of our rank doing on guard duty?
Her name!

EditorData.AnimationTags: [drider] walks with player toward tower. Needs cine version of walk <Greg>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The drider leads the player towards the front of Moonrise Tower, a surviving goblin from the ambush marching alongside his spindly legs.

Text.Value: I was trying to infiltrate the Harpers, until you ruined it.
In Her name.
In Her name.
Recognising our like.
The queen sent them! Her Majesty's flesh grows, full and glorious.
She's in the Great Hall. She'll be wanting to see you.
We - we would never! Our Majesty should have said.
They survived the dark, Majesty! Praise be.

EditorData.logicalname: Started with harpers and changed sides

Text.Value: Attack.
We are no fools - we will not be deceived by the likes of you!

Synopsis:
Player arrives at Moonrise Tower with the drider.
